Package game

Interface Summary
SpecialAbility An interface that contains the methods required for special abilities.
 

Class Summary
AirElemental A class depicting the Air Elemental piece.
ArcaneElemental A class depicting the Arcane Elemental piece.
Archangel A class depicting the Archangel piece
Archmage  
Bishop A class depicting the properties and functionality of the chess piece bishop
Board A class that defines the properties and functionalities of the game board.
Cavalier A class depicting the Cavalier piece.
Crypt A class depicting the Crypt piece.
EarthElemental A class depicting the Earth Elemental piece.
Footman A class depicting the Footman piece.
GraphicConstants A class that loads all the Images used for the Pieces and provides methods for staticly accessing the right Image.
King A class depicting the chess piece King.
Knight A class depicting the chess piece Knight.
Lich A class depicting the Lich-piece.
ManaNode A class depicting the Mana Node piece.
Necromancer A class depicting the Necromancer piece.
Pawn A class depicting the chess piece Pawn.
Piece An abstract class providing with the default functions of all game pieces.
Priest A class depicting the Priest piece.
Queen A class depicting the chess piece Queen.
Rook A class that depicts the chess piece Rook.
Skeleton A class depicting the Skeleton piece
Sorcerer A class depicting the Sorcerer piece
TheKing A class that depicts The King piece.
Tower A class depicting the Tower piece
Vampire A class depicting the Vampire piece
Wraith A class depicting the Wraith piece
 

Enum Summary
Faction An enumeration listing the different available Factions, as well as providing methods for e.g. receiving different kinds of Pieces according to Faction and parsing Factions from Strings.
 

Exception Summary
LoadException An exception thrown when loading a saved game proves unsuccesful.
SaveException An exception thrown when saving the game proves unsuccesful.
